rooms.description: Spacious living area with a central column design to allow natural light and airflow.
Adjacent dining area integrated into the living space for open-plan living.
Modern kitchen with a view to the courtyard and proper ventilation as per Vastu.
Small room for servant's quarters located near the service area, adhering to building norms.
Cozy library space with ample shelving and seating, designed for quiet study.
Balcony adjacent to the living room providing exterior relaxation space.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the positive direction as per Vastu.
Large windows in the living room to allow ample natural light and cross ventilation.
Service door for kitchen ensuring efficient movement.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with a private balcony and en-suite bathroom.
Spacious balcony for the master bedroom aligned per Vastu to promote good health.
Second bedroom with a dedicated balcony and storage space.
Fourth bedroom sharing a common area with attached balcony space.
Fifth bedroom with a small balcony section integrated into the shared space.

openings.description: Large windows for cross ventilation and natural lighting.
Balcony windows providing exterior views and fresh air.
Private entry door to the penthouse floor ensuring security.

rooms.description: Expansive terrace with a garden area to enjoy panoramic views and relaxation.

openings.description: Access door leading from the penthouse living area to the open terrace.
